p: Some projects, for example, now use online training modules that utilize text, images, games, and video. As Booney and colleagues point out, “Projects demanding high skill levels from participants can be successfully developed, but they require significant participant training and support materials such as training videos” [7]. Yet, while some of these remotely administered online training technologies go back more than a decade, there has been only limited study on the effectiveness of such different training methods. Knowing which training types are most effectual is crucial to successfully designing programs that can acquire high quality data at a reasonable cost.
